title: conferred on her by section 1(2) of the Criminal Justice (Hate Offences) Act
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Criminal Justice (Hate Offences) Act
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Criminal Justice (Hate Offences) Act 

2024 (Commencement) Order 2024.
text_norm: 1 order may cited criminal justice (hate offences) act 2024 (commencement) order 2024

title: conferred on her by section 1(2) of the Criminal Justice (Hate Offences) Act
heading: 2. The 31st day of December 2024 is appointed as the day on which the
text_raw:
2. The 31st day of December 2024 is appointed as the day on which the 
Criminal Justice (Hate Offences) Act 2024 (No. 41 of 2024) shall come into 
operation. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Minister for Justice, 

18 December, 2024. 

HELEN MCENTEE, 
Minister for Justice. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 31st December, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [730] 3
